Title: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
Writer: Burr Steers (screenplay), Jane Austen (Quirk Books novel), Seth Grahame-Smith (Quirk Books novel)
Actors: Lily James, Sam Riley, Bella Heathcote, Ellie Bamber
Plot: The five highly trained Bennett sisters in Georgian England must try to protect themselves from the growing zombie threat, find suitable husbands for themselves, battle marriage proposals and unlikely suitors, and save the country before it's too late.
Production: Head Gear Films, Allison Shearmur, Sierra Pictures, QC Entertainment, MadRiver Pictures, Handsomecharlie Films
